message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $150 is a bit steep for me. How about $100?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
Alice, $130 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go to $115.  This is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I can meet you halfway at $125, but I think it's as low as I can go.
